definition: perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]
to feel gratitude mixed with shame
ashamed and unable to show one's face (idiom)
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
little virtue and meager abilities (idiom); I'm a humble person and not much use at anything (Song writer Ouyang Xiu 欧阳修)
to compose in off-hand way (idiom); to dash off
to slap one's own buttocks in excitement or despair
lit. to live on dry provisions and wild herbs (idiom)/fig. to live in abject poverty
you have made a long and exhausting journey (套语 polite talk)/you will make a long trip (when asking a favor that involves going to a far away place)
